text: muhammedur rasulu-llah. vellezine me`ahu esiddau `ale-lkuffari ruhamau beynehum terahum rukke`an succedey yebtegune fadlem mine-llahi veridvana. simahum fi vucuhihim min eseri-ssucud. zalike meseluhum fi-ttevrah. vemeseluhum fi-l'incil. kezer`in ahrace sat'ehu feazerahu festagleza festeva `ala sukihi yu`cibu-zzurra`a liyegiza bihimu-lkuffar. ve`ade-llahu-llezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati minhum magfiratev veecran `azima
